description:
Contractors - Do you have a need to provide an estimate for reshingling a roof while in the field?  Roof Estimator will give you the ability to immediately quote a job.  It will also allow you to eMail a detailed material list to your clients. 

Home Owners - Are you questioning the estimates you're receiving from contractors on having your roof replaced? Roof Estimator will give you the confidence you are getting a fair price. 

The Basic estimator is a quick method to get a general cost of what it will take to have a roof reshingled. Simply enter the approximate square footage of the roof and the Roof Estimator  uses a predefined multiplier to provide an estimate.  The multiplier can be changed in the Preferences... screen.

The Detailed estimator will calculate a more accurate cost, and it will also supply a material list that you can email from within the app.

To customize the Roof Estimator’s calculations, the Preferences... screen allows for changes to material prices and other variables.  Feel free to customize Roof Estimator to your liking.
